resources.string: School of Career Development, Bangladesh (SCDB) is a non-profit career development institute in Bangladesh. Whatever your purpose, vision or dream, School of Career Development, Bangladesh helps you develop a plan to achieve it. We opened our doors for everyone on 2 December 2016. SCDB is a multi-accredited training centre with a proud record of working with students and professionals across Bangladesh. We seek to add value to the community, maximizing the potential of our learners to help them achieve their professional dreams and aspirations. School of Career Development Bangladesh (SCDB) comprises with Internsbd.com, SCDB Institute of Professional Development, SCDB CV Maker, and SCDB Health. The SCDB has a large core highly qualified management consultants who liaise with administrative and technical specialists. The team’s strength comes from a thorough knowledge of the Bangladeshi markets, its trends, and the ability to look at students’ specific requirements and use that knowledge to ensure success. SCDB provides proven solutions that can be quickly deployed and implemented in order to sustain performance and support the building of high-impact teams.
